languages.text: "Я не позволю тебе превратить измученную душу моей сестры в очередной трофей. Уж лучше я дарую ей милость, чем принесу еще больше страданий".

traits.locale_text: "Я не позволю тебе превратить измученную душу моей сестры в очередной трофей. Уж лучше я дарую ей милость, чем принесу еще больше страданий".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I will not let you turn my sister's tortured soul into another trophy. I would rather grant her mercy than cause her further suffering."
languages.original_text: "Я не позволю тебе превратить измученную душу моей сестры в очередной трофей. Уж лучше я дарую ей милость, чем принесу еще больше страданий".

traits.locale_text: "I will not let you turn my sister's tortured soul into another trophy. I would rather grant her mercy than cause her further suffering."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will not let you turn my sister's tortured soul into another trophy. I would rather grant her mercy than cause her further suffering."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will not let you turn my sister's tortured soul into another trophy. I would rather grant her mercy than cause her further suffering."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will not let you turn my sister's tortured soul into another trophy. I would rather grant her mercy than cause her further suffering."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will not let you turn my sister's tortured soul into another trophy. I would rather grant her mercy than cause her further suffering."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No permitiré que conviertas el alma torturada de mi hermana en otro trofeo. Prefiero concederle la piedad de la muerte antes que prolongar su sufrimiento».
languages.original_text: "I will not let you turn my sister's tortured soul into another trophy. I would rather grant her mercy than cause her further suffering."

traits.locale_text: «No permitiré que conviertas el alma torturada de mi hermana en otro trofeo. Prefiero concederle la piedad de la muerte antes que prolongar su sufrimiento».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「拷問された姉の魂を、戦利品などにはさせない。これ以上彼女に苦しみをもたらすより、むしろ慈悲を与えたい」
languages.original_text: "I will not let you turn my sister's tortured soul into another trophy. I would rather grant her mercy than cause her further suffering."

traits.locale_text: 「拷問された姉の魂を、戦利品などにはさせない。これ以上彼女に苦しみをもたらすより、むしろ慈悲を与えたい」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我决不允许你把我姐妹饱受折磨的灵魂变成战利品。我宁愿赐予她安宁，也不愿让她遭受更多痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "I will not let you turn my sister's tortured soul into another trophy. I would rather grant her mercy than cause her further suffering."

traits.locale_text: “我决不允许你把我姐妹饱受折磨的灵魂变成战利品。我宁愿赐予她安宁，也不愿让她遭受更多痛苦。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne vous laisserai pas transformer l'âme torturée de ma sœur en trophée. Je préfère lui accorder ma clémence plutôt que lui causer encore davantage de souffrances. »
languages.original_text: "I will not let you turn my sister's tortured soul into another trophy. I would rather grant her mercy than cause her further suffering."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous laisserai pas transformer l'âme torturée de ma sœur en trophée. Je préfère lui accorder ma clémence plutôt que lui causer encore davantage de souffrances. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich werde nicht zulassen, dass Ihr die gepeinigte Seele meiner Schwester zu Eurer Trophäe macht. Ich möchte lieber, dass sie Gnade und nicht noch weiteres Leid erfährt."
languages.original_text: "I will not let you turn my sister's tortured soul into another trophy. I would rather grant her mercy than cause her further suffering."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde nicht zulassen, dass Ihr die gepeinigte Seele meiner Schwester zu Eurer Trophäe macht. Ich möchte lieber, dass sie Gnade und nicht noch weiteres Leid erfährt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Kardeşimin kederli ruhunu ganimete çevirmene izin vermeyeceğim. Onun daha fazla eziyet çektiğini görmektense dilediği merhameti göstermeyi yeğlerim."
languages.original_text: "I will not let you turn my sister's tortured soul into another trophy. I would rather grant her mercy than cause her further suffering."

traits.locale_text: "Kız kardeşimin kederli ruhunu ganimete çevirmene izin vermeyeceğim. Onun daha fazla eziyet çektiğini görmektense dilediği merhameti göstermeyi yeğlerim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
